info.name: UpdatedLinqApiRegressionTests
info.description: Please use this folder to add any localization requests for testing

item.name: Pre-request script

exec: // This request is used to create a variable for brand where we use the brand name value as a string (with quotes).
const expBrandName = "Test Brand Production Testing Only"

// This request is used to create a variable for brand where we use the brand name value without string quotes. To make it work in JSON or similar formats, we wrap it in quotes manually using JSON.stringify.
const expBrand_Name = JSON.stringify("Test Brand Production Testing Only");
// Set or specialprice if not matching

item.description: In this folder we have added some pre-request script for the API collection so any mandatory variable is missing or value is missing will be created in environment.

exec: // Generate SKU value and set it to the environment
console.warn("Expected success message not found in response.");
